name: Construct: Embers of Life
description:
With no memory of who you are, you must discover the secrets of your past. Where did it all go wrong? Who will you become as you are tested by your surrounding environment?
This is a first person story driven sci-fi game with elements of horror. Do not go into this game expecting your typical horror game, I wanted this to be more of an adventure. More focused on story than anything else.
